page.title: 16Life Styles /Newton area
page.content: Life styles obviously vary from family to family. There are still a few families where the man rules the house, but in the main mother and father share responsibilies. Probably brought about through women going out to work. Farm workers are not well paid compared with other industries and their life style is modest. Their relaxation is within the home, they entertain little. Some go to the pub in the evenings, their wives mostly stay in.The better off have help in the house, give dinner parties regularly and have friends to their homes for drinks. The young of all groups go to the discos, spend evenings watching television and playing pop records,visit friends. Cycles are their means of transport. The elderly go to monthly clubs the very young attend playgroups.The
